doc:
Mary Castle https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mary_Castle 0 Mary Ann Castle (nee Mary Ann Noblett, January 22, 1931 – April 29, 1998) was an American actress of film and television whose personal problems destroyed her once burgeoning career. Castle's best known role was as female detective Frankie Adams in the syndicated western series, Stories of the Century, which aired from 1954 to 1955. Mary_Ann_Castle ( nee_Mary_Ann_Noblett , January_22_,_1931 – April_29_,_1998 ) was an_American_actress of film_and_television whose_personal_problems destroyed her_once_burgeoning_career . Castle 's_best_known_role was as female_detective_Frankie_Adams in the_syndicated_western_series , Stories of the_Century , which aired from 1954 to 1955 .
